channel.title: Sorry..but another compile error
channel.description:
hey..im the biggest noobie in the world and this is my error...(i didnt know the square root of 16 btw on the questionare)
TESTSCAPE
i have jdk 6.0,
i click compile and i get this lovely message: The system cannot find the path specified press any key to continue....
in my system->advanced->enviromental variables->classpath i have: C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\
in my system->advanced->enviromental variables->PATH i have: C:Windows\System32\;"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\
in compile i have: @echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
in runserver i have: @echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
Please someone help me..thanks alot if you do :))
if there is anything i can help you with...sam_guil@hotmail.com

item.title: Sorry..but another compile error
item.dc:creator: @SirPure SirPure
item.description:
@SirPure wrote:

hey…im the biggest noobie in the world and this is my error…(i didnt know the square root of 16 btw on the questionare)

TESTSCAPE

i have jdk 6.0,

i click compile and i get this lovely message: The system cannot find the path specified
press any key to continue…

in my system->advanced->enviromental variables->classpath i have: C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\

in my system->advanced->enviromental variables->PATH i have: C:Windows\System32;"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\

in compile i have: @echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

in runserver i have: @echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Please someone help me…thanks alot if you do :))

if there is anything i can help you with...sam_guil@hotmail.com
